version_description: Bug fixes for iOS10.
Bug fixes for iOS10.

A new, simple design shows you a breakdown of your bill. See one-time charges, late fees, first bill charges and a summary of your next bill.

Live chat with an expert from the Support section of the app whenever you need help.

Use FamilyBase® to manage and monitor your family’s wireless activity.

Transfer your videos, contacts, photos and more to a new device with Content Transfer.

Suspend or reconnect a line in just a few taps.

Enjoy all-you-can-stream data sessions with PopData. Get 30 or 60 minutes of unlimited 4G LTE data without using your data plan.

Send and receive data gifts.

Find a Verizon store near you. Easily make an appointment with an in-store expert.

Use your device to buy accessories or get more info about them while in a store. Just scan the item barcode through the app.

We’re excited to announce the My Verizon App is now available to Prepaid customers! 
* Smartphone access to your account 24/7.  
* Monitor your data and add more the instant you need it.  
* Change your data and/or calling plan at anytime in a few easy steps.  
* Take advantage of AutoPay and easily manage your payment settings.  
* Add an International plan whenever you need it in just a few taps.

We’re excited to announce the My Verizon App is now available to Prepaid customers! 
* Smartphone access to your account 24/7.  
* Monitor your data and add more the instant you need it.  
* Change your data and/or calling plan at anytime in a few easy steps.  
* Take advantage of AutoPay and easily manage your payment settings.  
* Add an International plan whenever you need it in just a few taps.

Introducing Verizon Up - our new rewards program just for being a Verizon customer.  Get rewards ranging from everyday treats like music, rides and shows to once-in-a-lifetime experiences like VIP passes to exclusive concerts.  Enroll today, exclusively in the My Verizon app.

Introducing Verizon Up - our new rewards program just for being a Verizon customer.  Get rewards ranging from everyday treats like music, rides and shows to once-in-a-lifetime experiences like VIP passes to exclusive concerts.  Enroll today, exclusively in the My Verizon app.

• Check out our new Go Unlimited and Beyond Unlimited plans.  
• Easily review plans side by side, so you can compare and choose the perfect fit. 
• Use the new International dialing tool for help calling outside the USA.  
• Use PayPal to purchase devices and accessories directly within the app.

• Check out our new Go Unlimited and Beyond Unlimited plans.  
• Easily review plans side by side, so you can compare and choose the perfect fit. 
• Use the new International dialing tool for help calling outside the USA.  
• Use PayPal to purchase devices and accessories directly within the app.

• The My Verizon App is now supported in Spanish. To access, simply set you device language to Spanish.
• Checkout the Alerts & Messaging Center. It provides a single place to get important updates about your Verizon Account. You can easily access the Alerts & Messaging Center from the Main Menu.
• FamilyBase® is now Verizon Smart Family™. Set usage limits, block inappropriate content and much more.

• It’s the end of the one-size-fits all family plan. Now you can mix and match the best Unlimited plans for everyone in your family - right in the app.
• Verizon Up has even more rewards — no credits needed. New Local Offers let you enjoy up to 50% off dining hotspots and fun activities every day, any where you go in North America.

• It’s the end of the one-size-fits all family plan. Now you can mix and match the best Unlimited plans for everyone in your family - right in the app.
• Verizon Up has even more rewards — no credits needed. New Local Offers let you enjoy up to 50% off dining hotspots and fun activities every day, any where you go in North America.
Now it’s easier for Verizon Up members to keep track of and use their rewards. On the Use tab, sort rewards by expiration date, alphabetically by brand, or by newest rewards.
Bug fixes.
Bug fixes.

If you’re thinking about joining Verizon, you can get started in the app—and get a special offer. Just download the app and follow the instructions to join, choose a plan, even sign up to get rewards every month with Verizon Up. Just tap Join Verizon.
It’s easier to check if your devices are eligible to upgrade. Just go to Devices to see when you’re eligible and even start your upgrade in just a tap.

If you have a iPhone XR, iPhone XS, or iPhone XS Max, you can now add service on the eSIM (for a Dual Sim Dual Standby device) from the App. This lets you have two lines of service on the same device. It's really great if you travel internationally. Its also great if you want a business and personal line on the same device.

If you have a iPhone XR, iPhone XS, or iPhone XS Max, you can now add service on the eSIM (for a Dual Sim Dual Standby device) from the App. This lets you have two lines of service on the same device. It's really great if you travel internationally. Its also great if you want a business and personal line on the same device.

Want to join the best network? If you have an unlocked iPhone XS, XS Max or XR, you just need to download the My Verizon app and follow the instructions to choose a plan and get a new number (or port an existing one).

Verizon Up is even more rewarding! You’ll get 1 credit each and every month just for being a customer. That’s 1 fresh, new reward every month—choose from tech, gift cards, concert and sports experiences and more.

And, it’s easier for Verizon Up members to use Device Dollars and Accessory Discount rewards when shopping in the app. During check out, just follow the instructions and tap to apply your savings to eligible devices and accessories. No more copying and pasting codes!

And, it’s easier for Verizon Up members to use Device Dollars and Accessory Discount rewards when shopping in the app. During check out, just follow the instructions and tap to apply your savings to eligible devices and accessories. No more copying and pasting codes!

We’re here for you 24/7. Use the app for help without leaving home during COVID-19: you can shop for the latest devices, pay your bill, update your account and more.

For more on Verizon's COVID-19 response go to vzw.com/coronavirus.

• In response to COVID-19, we've expanded our First Responders discount to teachers and nurses. Thank you for all that you do!
• If you need to visit a store, use the app on your phone to check-in. It’s contactless and you don’t need to provide any documents.
• Payment options are expanded to make it easier for you. If you usually pay in a store, you can now find Western Union and Firserv locations in the app that will also accept cash payments.
• Payment options also include enhanced payment arrangements that you can set up right from the app.

We’re here for you 24/7. Use the app for help without leaving home during COVID-19: you can shop for the latest devices, pay your bill, update your account and more.

For more on Verizon's COVID-19 response go to vzw.com/coronavirus.

• In response to COVID-19, we've expanded our First Responders discount to teachers and nurses. Thank you for all that you do!
• If you need to visit a store, use the app on your phone to check-in. It’s contactless and you don’t need to provide any documents.
• Payment options are expanded to make it easier for you. If you usually pay in a store, you can now find Western Union and Firserv locations in the app that will also accept cash payments.
• Payment options also include enhanced payment arrangements that you can set up right from the app.

We’re here for you 24/7 during COVID-19: pay your bill, check data usage, check updated store hours and more from the app. For more go to vzw.com/coronavirus.

• After testing with real customers, we are rolling out our optimized navigation for a better app experience.
• Starting June 1, Verizon Up members can choose rewards from more of their favorite national brands every month.
• Save when you purchase multiple accessories using our new bundle builder.

We’re here for you 24/7: pay your bill, check data usage, find updated store hours and more.

New in the app this month:
• Discover the new Verizon VisaⓇ Card and the additional rewards it unlocks.
• Choose new bill pay options during this time of economic hardship.
• Switch to Verizon right in the app. You can even bring your own device.

For the latest on Verizon’s response to COVID-19, go to vzw.com/coronavirus.

We’re here for you 24/7. Pay your bill, track data usage, find up-to-date store hours and more, when you need to.

New in the app this month:
• Safely get deliveries to your vehicle with contactless curbside pickup.
• Use contactless check-in at third-party retailers.
• View a video breakdown of your bill.

For Verizon’s latest response to COVID-19, go to vzw.com/coronavirus.

New this month:

Discover new mix and match plan features: Disney+, Hulu and Apple Music subscriptions, 600GB of online storage, and unlimited streaming for kids are all included.
Find new discounts for teachers, nurses and seniors.
Visiting our store? Make an appointment right in the app and save time.
We've made sign in easier with some bug fixes. If you're having trouble, try updating your app.

For Verizon’s latest response to COVID-19, go to vz.to/coronavirus.

New this month:

• Discover the latest releases, like the Apple Watch Series 6.
• Explore our improved app navigation, designed to make shopping and account management easier.
• With Call Filter, screen incoming calls and say goodbye to spam.
• We’ve patched more bugs and continue to monitor your feedback.

For our latest on COVID-19, go to vz.to/coronavirus.

• Our newest plans and offers, including the new iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro.

• Our newest plans and offers, including for the new iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro.
• (iOS only) We’ve enhanced Call Filter to add call history, the ability to report spam numbers via call history, and a count view of blocked calls. View in the app today.
• Bug fixes for the sign in experience.

New this month:

• Get the new discovery+ service on us for 12 months. Now available to select customers.
• New customers bringing their number to Verizon can now track progress in the app and activate their device with eSIM.
• We've improved our in-store pickup and appointments experiences.
• We redesigned the Account page to make critical functions easier to find.
• We've continued to fix bugs across the app.

• We simplified and streamlined the way customers redeem rewards in Verizon Up.

• We're continually working on and improving the app to bring you the best experience.
